import Link from "next/link"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { IoIosArrowDown, IoIosArrowForward } from "react-icons/io"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getAllCategories } from "../../../redux/actions"; import { generatePublicUrl } from "../../../urlConfig"; const Navigation = () => { const category = useSelector(state => state.category) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAllCategories()) }, []) return (

); }; export default Navigation;
